main event: An unidentified object was sighted in the sky over Washington, D.C. on June 13, 1963.
interesting points: The object changed in size, able to increase, diminish or fade during phases of clear and cloudy skies.
The object moved back and forth from south to east, going from an elevation of 60 degrees.
The object was still in sight when the observers retired for the night.
The object had a pinkish glow around it.
The sighting lasted for over an hour.
